articles.author: Tom Nicholson
articles.title: France tells Israel to halt Golan Heights incursion - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Paris calls military deployment in buffer zone “a violation of the 1974 disengagement agreement” between Damascus and Tel Aviv.
articles.content:
The United Nations has also criticized Israel for violating the 1974 agreement.
On Sunday, as Damascus fell to rebel groups and Syrian dictator President Bashar Assad fled to Moscow, Israeli Prime M… [+1313 chars]
